analyzed: ngan song gsum la skyob pa'i gsung skyabs gsum la ni mngon dga' zhing nges par spro bas ste zhe dag pa
translated: With delight, one should be devoted to the three refuges.

original: na skyabs gnas su byed pa/_/rtshe mo las/_'jig rten ni gang zag bzhi/_bskal pa brgyad ni brtshon byas shing /_/
analyzed: na skyabs gnas su byed pa/_/rtshe mo las/_'jig rten ni gang zag bzhi/_bskal pa brgyad ni brtshon byas shing /_/

analyzed: cho ga bzhin du kun spyad kyang /_/de dag 'grub par yod mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni ma skyed pa/_/the tshhom
translated: Those who have not generated the awakening mind,🔽Those who have doubts,🔽Those who do not seek the instructions,

original: yod pa nyid dang ni/_/gang zhig bka' bstshol mi byed dang /_/ma dad pas ni mi 'grub ces pas byang chub bzhi
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang ni/_/gang zhig bka' bstshol mi byed dang /_/ma dad pas ni mi 'grub ces pas byang chub bzhi
translated: And those who are not faithful will not accomplish it.”🔽The supreme abandonment is superior to that of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.🔽The supreme realization is the undiminishing realization of the mind.🔽The supreme practice is the practice of the outer and inner bodhicitta.

original: spangs pa mchog nyan rang las mchog du gyur pa b+hu ta'i gsung /_sems rtogs pa thugs su chud pa ma nyams pa
analyzed: spangs pa mchog nyan rang las mchog du gyur pa b+hu ta'i gsung /_sems rtogs pa thugs su chud pa ma nyams pa
translated: The supreme result is the result of the three kāyas.🔽The supreme field is the field of all sentient beings.🔽The supreme dedication is the dedication to great enlightenment.🔽The supreme reliance is the reliance on the guru.🔽The supreme training is the training in the six perfections.

original: brtan pa dang phyi dang nang gi 'jug pas zhugs gsung /_/dkyil 'khor zhugs shing dbang
analyzed: brtan pa dang phyi dang nang gi 'jug pas zhugs gsung /_/dkyil 'khor zhugs shing dbang
translated: The supreme object is the object of the two types of no-self.🔽The supreme view is the view of the two types of selflessness.🔽The supreme meditation is the meditation on the two types of no-self.🔽The supreme action is the action of the six perfections.🔽The supreme result is the result of the three kāyas.🔽The supreme field is the field of all sentient beings.🔽The supreme dedication is the dedication to great enlightenment.🔽The supreme reliance is the reliance on the guru.🔽The supreme training is the training in the six perfections.🔽The supreme object is the object of the two types of no-self.🔽The supreme view is the view of the two types of selflessness.🔽The supreme meditation is the meditation on the two types of no-self.🔽The supreme action is the action of the six perfections.🔽The supreme result is the result of the three kāyas.🔽The supreme field is the field of all sentient beings.🔽The supreme dedication is the dedication to great enlightenment.🔽The supreme reliance is the reliance on the guru.🔽The supreme training is the training in the six perfections.

original: thob nas/_/mngon rtogs 'phel ba'am mi 'dab pas/_snyom pa las kyis yal bar mi 'dor bar/_yang
analyzed: thob nas/_/mngon rtogs 'phel ba'am mi 'dab pas/_snyom pa las kyis yal bar mi 'dor bar/_yang
translated: The supreme object is the object of the two types of no-self.🔽The supreme view is the view of the two types of selflessness.🔽The supreme meditation is the meditation on the two types of no-self.🔽The supreme action is the action of the six perfections.🔽The supreme result is the result of the three kāyas.

original: ma d+har ka la pa shang chud pas/_dngos grub dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas gsung /_bdag 'dzin gyi rtogs pa tshhe
analyzed: ma d+har ka la pa shang chud pas/_dngos grub dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas gsung /_bdag 'dzin gyi rtogs pa tshhe
translated: and since the Madhyamikas are included in the Prasangikas, the place should accord with the siddhi.

original: zhing bdag med pa'i rtog pa chung na/_khams bde ba'i yan lag du grub na khrus bya/_ta ki'i bzhir pa las rnam shes
analyzed: zhing bdag med pa'i rtog pa chung na/_khams bde ba'i yan lag du grub na khrus bya/_ta ki'i bzhir pa las rnam shes
translated: If the realization of self-grasping is exhausted and the realization of selflessness is small, then if the elements are comfortable, one should bathe.

original: hum gi gzugs lus ngag yid gsum dag pa bya nyid do/_/dam tshhig spyod pa la brtshon pas/_/ri sul
analyzed: hum gi gzugs lus ngag yid gsum dag pa bya nyid do/_/dam tshhig spyod pa la brtshon pas/_/ri sul
translated: In the four directions of the hearth, one should purify body, speech, and mind with the form of the consciousness as a hum.🔽Since one is devoted to the conduct of samaya, in a mountain

original: ri rtshe chu ngogs 'dus pa rgya mtshho'i 'gram/_/shing cig zhi gnas ma mo'i khyim mam
analyzed: ri rtshe chu ngogs 'dus pa rgya mtshho'i 'gram/_/shing cig zhi gnas ma mo'i khyim mam
translated: cave, on a mountain peak, on a riverbank, on the shore of a great lake, under a tree, in the house of a peaceful woman,🔽in a charnel ground, or in a temple or stupa that has been there for seven years,

original: dur khrod dam/_/bskyed ched du byas pa'i skye shing gsung tshhal lha khang mchod rten lo bdun nam
analyzed: dur khrod dam/_/bskyed ched du byas pa'i skye shing gsung tshhal lha khang mchod rten lo bdun nam
translated: if one is able to stay there, in an empty house, at a crossroads,

original: bzung na khang stong bzhi mdo 'am/_/yid de shas che bas ni gang du dga' yid rjes mthun
analyzed: bzung na khang stong bzhi mdo 'am/_/yid de shas che bas ni gang du dga' yid rjes mthun
translated: or wherever the mind is most comfortable, one should stay there.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gnod mdzes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gnod mdzes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/
translated: The Means of Attaining the Great Wrathful King of Wrathful Ones, the Glorious Bhagavat Vajra Acala, Who Destroys All Enemies🔽Sit on a comfortable seat, and in your heart visualize the self-arisen, warm-light-possessing [fire].

original: bar bde ba'i stan gnas ste/_/snying kar rang 'byung 'od dro can/_/der
analyzed: bar bde ba'i stan gnas ste/_/snying kar rang 'byung 'od dro can/_/der
translated: There,

original: gnas dzu gi 'od zer gyis/_/sngon grub pa bsgrub pa mnyes pa tshhangs ma rgya byin mo sogs rnams
analyzed: gnas dzu gi 'od zer gyis/_/sngon grub pa bsgrub pa mnyes pa tshhangs ma rgya byin mo sogs rnams
translated: the light rays of Jogi [i.e., Acala] please the previously accomplished adepts, such as Pūrṇabhadra, Siddhipā, and so forth,

original: legs bskul bas/_/nam mkha' gang ba gsal bltas la/_/phyag 'tshhal lus
analyzed: legs bskul bas/_/nam mkha' gang ba gsal bltas la/_/phyag 'tshhal lus
translated: who are summoned well, and who fill the sky. Visualize them, and with body, speech, and mind

original: dbul nyer spyod lngas mchod cing bshags dang rjes yid rang /_/ya sa sngo skyabs 'gro chos
analyzed: dbul nyer spyod lngas mchod cing bshags dang rjes yid rang /_/ya sa sngo skyabs 'gro chos
translated: pay homage, offer your body, and make offerings with the five acts of service. Confess [deeds], rejoice, and go for refuge.

original: 'khor bskul mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/_/sems bskyed smon pa gsung dang /_lam gnas
analyzed: 'khor bskul mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/_/sems bskyed smon pa gsung dang /_lam gnas
translated: Request the wheel of dharma, request not to pass into nirvana, generate the aspiration [to enlightenment], and recite the path-abiding [vows].

original: 'jug pa gsung tshhangs pa'i gnas mthar de nyid kyang zhu bzhi rnams b+ho sa te/_/gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa'i de rig pa 'joms pa dang mi byed pas ye shes rig bya rig byed mi phyed pas rdo rje shu n+ya tas🔽mchog sgo bya/_/sngar gyi tshhad med pa'i phrin las ma nu'i don du b+hud+ha thob par bya mnyam pa dang nam mkhar
analyzed: 'jug pa gsung tshhangs pa'i gnas mthar de nyid kyang zhu bzhi rnams b+ho sa te/_/gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa'i de rig pa 'joms pa dang mi byed pas ye shes rig bya rig byed mi phyed pas rdo rje shu n+ya tas mchog sgo bya/_/sngar gyi tshhad med pa'i phrin las ma nu'i don du b+hud+ha thob par bya mnyam pa dang nam mkhar
translated: Since it is the maṇḍala of the sun, it is the sun.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the moon, it is the moon.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the earth.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the water.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the fire.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the air.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the space.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the jewel.

original: ram las nyid dkyil 'khor/_/de gyur pa las stengs hum las 'od 'phros 'dus gyur pa las byung sna
analyzed: ram las nyid dkyil 'khor/_/de gyur pa las stengs hum las 'od 'phros 'dus gyur pa las byung sna
translated: Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the lotus.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the sword.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the wheel.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the banner.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the vase.

original: tshhogs rdo rje las/_/'od 'phros de las rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'phros ra ba sa gzhi gur/_/bla
analyzed: tshhogs rdo rje las/_/'od 'phros de las rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'phros ra ba sa gzhi gur/_/bla
translated: Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the crossed vajra.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the bell.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the supreme mudra.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the supreme maṇḍala.

original: re dra ba me 'od h+ya dang sgrar byung a brlab sgo/_/der ni pam las sna tshhogs pad+ma'i lte bar rgyu las
analyzed: re dra ba me 'od h+ya dang sgrar byung a brlab sgo/_/der ni pam las sna tshhogs pad+ma'i lte bar rgyu las
translated: Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the supreme maṇḍala.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the supreme maṇḍala.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements, it is the supreme maṇḍala.🔽Since it is the maṇḍala of the four elements

original: a li rnam pa zla ba dang rang bzhin me long ye shes ngo bo shes rab gyur pa las 'dab ma brgyad a li dang /_/ka
analyzed: a li rnam pa zla ba dang rang bzhin me long ye shes ngo bo shes rab gyur pa las 'dab ma brgyad a li dang /_/ka
translated: The eight petals of the A Li are the nature of the mirror-like wisdom, and the nature of the wisdom of discernment.🔽The eight petals of the Ka Li are the nature of the wisdom of equality, and the nature of method.

original: li las byung rgyu ka li rnam pa nyi ma rang bzhin mnyam nyid ngo bo thabs zla nyi'i dbus son las 'od 'phros
analyzed: li las byung rgyu ka li rnam pa nyi ma rang bzhin mnyam nyid ngo bo thabs zla nyi'i dbus son las 'od 'phros
translated: Light radiates from the center of the sun and moon,🔽performs the benefit of sentient beings, and returns.

original: sems can don byas tshhur 'dus hum gyur pa'i/_/rdo rje lte ba'i khongs chud hum gis 'phro 'du
analyzed: sems can don byas tshhur 'dus hum gyur pa'i/_/rdo rje lte ba'i khongs chud hum gis 'phro 'du
translated: The light gathers into the syllable HŪṂ, which dissolves into the center of the vajra.🔽The syllable HŪṂ radiates and gathers back,

original: las/_/sa pas b+hud d+ha sgo d+hi 'od zer gyi rnam par tshhur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las yongs su rdzogs pa khro
analyzed: las/_/sa pas b+hud d+ha sgo d+hi 'od zer gyi rnam par tshhur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las yongs su rdzogs pa khro
translated: and the light gathers into the syllable BHRŪṂ, which completely transforms into the perfect🔽wrathful mandala.

original: bo'i 'khor lo b+he par bya/_/sna tshhogs chus skyes 'dab lte bar 'dren pa mchog_/hum
analyzed: bo'i 'khor lo b+he par bya/_/sna tshhogs chus skyes 'dab lte bar 'dren pa mchog_/hum
translated: The supreme guide is in the center of the multicolored lotus.🔽The syllable HŪṂ is the seed of the cause, and the hand implements are the nature of the discriminating wisdom.

original: mdzad rgyu sa bon rnam pa phyag mtshhan rang bzhin so sor rtog pa/_rgyu gdan nyi zla phyag mtshhan rnam pa 'od kyi gong bu
analyzed: mdzad rgyu sa bon rnam pa phyag mtshhan rang bzhin so sor rtog pa/_rgyu gdan nyi zla phyag mtshhan rnam pa 'od kyi gong bu
translated: The sun and moon seats of the cause are the hand implements, and the form of the light is the all-accomplishing wisdom.

original: rang bzhin bya ba grub pa rgyu 'od gong rnam pa sku rang bzhin chos dbyings in tra ni la'i mdog brgyad dang brgyad gnyis zhal phyag gis/_/rnam mdzes 'jig rten gsum rgyal sgo/_/dbang
analyzed: rang bzhin bya ba grub pa rgyu 'od gong rnam pa sku rang bzhin chos dbyings in tra ni la'i mdog brgyad dang brgyad gnyis zhal phyag gis/_/rnam mdzes 'jig rten gsum rgyal sgo/_/dbang
translated: The door of the world is the victory over the three worlds.

original: sngon chu shel 'dzam+bu'i chu gser dza ba dang /_/su ma tih_rtsha zhal sngo/_g.yas dkar g.yon
analyzed: sngon chu shel 'dzam+bu'i chu gser dza ba dang /_/su ma tih_rtsha zhal sngo/_g.yas dkar g.yon
translated: The color of the face is blue like sapphire, the right face is white, the left face is red, and the back face is yellow.

original: dmar rgyab ser de'i steng na gsum dbus dkar g.yas sngo g.yon ser de'i steng du ma dmar/_b+ha tra bo de rtsha zhal g.yon
analyzed: dmar rgyab ser de'i steng na gsum dbus dkar g.yas sngo g.yon ser de'i steng du ma dmar/_b+ha tra bo de rtsha zhal g.yon
translated: On top of that, the three faces are white, the right face is blue, the left face is yellow, and on top of that, the red face is red.🔽The left face is red, the right face is white, and the back face is blue.

original: gyi gsum kun dang ut+pal gtsho ma'i sten la gser dang pad+ma ra ga_/spyan gsum ba dan
analyzed: gyi gsum kun dang ut+pal gtsho ma'i sten la gser dang pad+ma ra ga_/spyan gsum ba dan
translated: On top of that, the three faces are all blue, and on top of the utpala and lotus, there is gold and red.

original: thugs rjes ma nu'i don la chags pa'i du'i mdog can mche' brtshigs bdud bzhi 'joms pa thod pa'i/_/
analyzed: thugs rjes ma nu'i don la chags pa'i du'i mdog can mche' brtshigs bdud bzhi 'joms pa thod pa'i/_/
translated: The three eyes are the color of compassion, and the fangs are the color of passion for the benefit of those to be tamed.

original: 'phreng bas thod byas sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo yang na steng na sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/_/
analyzed: 'phreng bas thod byas sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo yang na steng na sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/_/
translated: The garland of skulls is the nature of the five buddhas, or on top of that, there is a crown of the five buddhas.

original: bzhugs tshhul g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pa yis/_/bde byed kyi ni mgo bo dang /_/ u ma'i nu ma mnan mdzad cing /_/khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/_/
analyzed: bzhugs tshhul g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pa yis/_/bde byed kyi ni mgo bo dang /_/ u ma'i nu ma mnan mdzad cing /_/khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/_/
translated: and he looks with wrathful eyes.

original: rdo rjes mtshhan pa'i phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan cing /_/mgo bo'i do shal mgo🔽'phreng ske rags rus pa'i ske rags dang gnyis yod pas gsung stag lpags rlon pa gos/_/phyag dang po
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshhan pa'i phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan cing /_/mgo bo'i do shal mgo 'phreng ske rags rus pa'i ske rags dang gnyis yod pas gsung stag lpags rlon pa gos/_/phyag dang po
translated: He is adorned with the six symbolic ornaments marked with vajras,🔽and he has a necklace of heads, a garland of heads, a bone necklace, and a bone belt.

original: gnyis sdigs 'dzub kyi rtshe lcags kyu ltar gug ge pa rgyab sprod nas the chung gnyis g.yas 'ching ba'i phyag
analyzed: gnyis sdigs 'dzub kyi rtshe lcags kyu ltar gug ge pa rgyab sprod nas the chung gnyis g.yas 'ching ba'i phyag
translated: His first two hands are in the threatening mudra, with the index fingers bent like hooks and the little fingers crossed behind.

original: gis rdo rje dang /_/g.yon dril bus rang snang rig ma rang ji 'dra ba la 'khyud gnyis
analyzed: gis rdo rje dang /_/g.yon dril bus rang snang rig ma rang ji 'dra ba la 'khyud gnyis
translated: With the two hands below that, he holds a vajra and a bell, embracing his self-appearing awareness consort, who is similar to him.

original: med zag med pa bde/_/dang po'i 'og ma gnyis kyis dpral ba'i steng du sngar gyi phyag rgya/
analyzed: med zag med pa bde/_/dang po'i 'og ma gnyis kyis dpral ba'i steng du sngar gyi phyag rgya/
translated: The two below that hold the same threatening mudra as before, with the index fingers crossed on the forehead.

original: sdigs 'dzub lcags kyu'i 'ching ba de nyid bcas pa 'o/_/gzhan g.yon gsum pa rnams
analyzed: sdigs 'dzub lcags kyu'i 'ching ba de nyid bcas pa 'o/_/gzhan g.yon gsum pa rnams
translated: The other three left hands hold a skull cup, a trident, and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: thod pa kha tam ga_/ral gri dang ni lnga pa lcags kyu dang /_/drug pa sdigs 'dzub dang bcas pa zhags pa bdun pa 'khor lo dang /_/g.yas gsum pa rin po che dang bzhi pa tho ba🔽mdung bar pa/_/drug pa mgo bo bdun pa cang te'u brgyad pa nyid kyi na ra'i/_/lpags pa'i🔽gos mchog steng du mgo g.yas bstan 'dzin/_/phyogs yangs kyi mdab mar lugs las🔽bzlog pa yis/_/shar 'dod pa'i rdo rje byang sngon po dang /_/nub stobs chen rdo rje
analyzed: thod pa kha tam ga_/ral gri dang ni lnga pa lcags kyu dang /_/drug pa sdigs 'dzub dang bcas pa zhags pa bdun pa 'khor lo dang /_/g.yas gsum pa rin po che dang bzhi pa tho ba mdung bar pa/_/drug pa mgo bo bdun pa cang te'u brgyad pa nyid kyi na ra'i/_/lpags pa'i gos mchog steng du mgo g.yas bstan 'dzin/_/phyogs yangs kyi mdab mar lugs las bzlog pa yis/_/shar 'dod pa'i rdo rje byang sngon po dang /_/nub stobs chen rdo rje

original: sngo ljang dmar dang dud ka ngur sprig dmar nag bsres/_/drug phyed zhal dang gsum
analyzed: sngo ljang dmar dang dud ka ngur sprig dmar nag bsres/_/drug phyed zhal dang gsum
translated: The colors are green, red, maroon, and dark maroon.🔽🔽There are six and a half faces and three eyes.🔽

original: gnyis phyag gnyis/_/spyan gsum mche ba rnam brtshigs zhal/_/thod pa'i
analyzed: gnyis phyag gnyis/_/spyan gsum mche ba rnam brtshigs zhal/_/thod pa'i
translated: He has six and a half faces, three eyes, bared fangs, and a face with a gaping mouth.

original: 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan cing g.yas dang po nas 'dod pa'i rdo rje tho ba rdo rje sngon po'i dbyig pa/
analyzed: 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan cing g.yas dang po nas 'dod pa'i rdo rje tho ba rdo rje sngon po'i dbyig pa/
translated: He is adorned with a garland of skulls and in his first right hand he holds a desire-vajra hammer, a blue-vajra-topped hammer.

original: bcom ldan 'das da mdzes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das da mdzes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/
translated: This is the sādhana of the great wrathful king, the beautiful Bhagavān, who conquers all enemies.

original: stobs chen mdung rtshe gsum mi g.yo ral gri/_na ra'i rus pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa'o/_/🔽g.yas rim pa bzhin tshhangs pa phung po'i bdud brkyang dbang po lha'i zhabs nye dbang kyis drag po nyon mongs
analyzed: stobs chen mdung rtshe gsum mi g.yo ral gri/_na ra'i rus pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa'o/_/ g.yas rim pa bzhin tshhangs pa phung po'i bdud brkyang dbang po lha'i zhabs nye dbang kyis drag po nyon mongs
translated: He has a great strength spear, a three-pronged trident, an immovable sword, and is adorned with human bone ornaments.🔽In his right hands, in order, he tramples the four māras: the aggregate māra of Brahmā, the afflictive māra of Indra, the devaputra māra of feet, and the lord of death māra of speech.

original: 'chi bdag gsung bdud bzhi rnam mnan cing /_/'dren pa'i ste gtsho bo phyag rgya 'ching
analyzed: 'chi bdag gsung bdud bzhi rnam mnan cing /_/'dren pa'i ste gtsho bo phyag rgya 'ching
translated: He makes the mudrā of leading with his left hands, in order, in the manner of a noose.

original: ba'i phyag rgya dag gis/_/rang gi mtshhan ma dang ni dril bu 'am/_/rdo rje yang thams
analyzed: ba'i phyag rgya dag gis/_/rang gi mtshhan ma dang ni dril bu 'am/_/rdo rje yang thams
translated: The mudras of the individual deities are as follows:🔽The mudra of the principal one is to hold the vajra and bell,🔽with the right hand holding the vajra and bell, embracing the self-appearing knowledge consort.

original: cad g.yas rdo rje dril bus rang snang rig mar 'khyud/_/phyag gzhan dag gis bdag🔽po yi/_/phyag rgya dpral bar 'ching ba dang /_/thod pa kha tam kha 'dzin a bi nas rang
analyzed: cad g.yas rdo rje dril bus rang snang rig mar 'khyud/_/phyag gzhan dag gis bdag po yi/_/phyag rgya dpral bar 'ching ba dang /_/thod pa kha tam kha 'dzin a bi nas rang
translated: With the other hands, one forms the mudras of the lords🔽at the forehead, holding a skull cup and khaṭvāṅga,🔽and the mudra of holding the bell with one’s own mudra.🔽The mudras of the others are as follows: hammer, club, spear,

original: gi phyag rgya dril bur bcas 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste ces pa dang tho ba dbyug to mdung dang ni/_ral gri dril bu de
analyzed: gi phyag rgya dril bur bcas 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste ces pa dang tho ba dbyug to mdung dang ni/_ral gri dril bu de
translated: sword, and bell.🔽Alternatively, all hold vajra and bell.

original: bzhin no/_/yang na thams cad rdo rje dril bu te ces so/_/brla la hro sho/_byin pa la ang rtsha sor mo la hum sge/
analyzed: bzhin no/_/yang na thams cad rdo rje dril bu te ces so/_/brla la hro sho/_byin pa la ang rtsha sor mo la hum sge/
translated: On the thighs are hūṃ and śa, on the calves aṅkuśa, on the toes hūṃ and śa,

original: bol la me   ma the bo la la tsham/_pus mo la me kha la la /_sna la yu gsang bar rdo bshang bar su mig gnyis rna ba
analyzed: bol la me   ma the bo la la tsham/_pus mo la me kha la la /_sna la yu gsang bar rdo bshang bar su mig gnyis rna ba
translated: on the knees la, on the hips la, on the nose yu, in the secret place ra, in the anus su, in the eyes two ma,🔽and in the ears two ya.

original: gnyis la yang bzhi'o/_/cing /_/sdigs 'dzub rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/_/gnas gsum
analyzed: gnyis la yang bzhi'o/_/cing /_/sdigs 'dzub rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/_/gnas gsum
translated: The mudra of the principal one is to hold the vajra and make a threatening gesture.🔽The mudras of the others are as follows:

original: la ni rdo rje gsum b+ho cing /_/lus gnas spyir gsum du yod pa las 'di'i go cha chen pos
analyzed: la ni rdo rje gsum b+ho cing /_/lus gnas spyir gsum du yod pa las 'di'i go cha chen pos
translated: The great armor🔽protects.🔽The wisdom being

original: yang dag bsrung /_/h+ya dang phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyer bkug pa'i/_/ye shes
analyzed: yang dag bsrung /_/h+ya dang phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyer bkug pa'i/_/ye shes
translated: is summoned with the mudra and the mantra.

original: dam tshhig gnyis su med ye shes pa dang dus gcig byon pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la
analyzed: dam tshhig gnyis su med ye shes pa dang dus gcig byon pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la
translated: The wisdom being and the samaya being become nondual.🔽Think that all tathagatas confer empowerment and say, “Please confer empowerment on me.”

original: dbang bskur du gsol zhes pa dang gya brjod cing dbang bskur bar bsam mo gsung sprad dbang bskur/_/om
analyzed: dbang bskur du gsol zhes pa dang gya brjod cing dbang bskur bar bsam mo gsung sprad dbang bskur/_/om
translated: The empowerment is conferred.🔽Om🔽sumbhani sumbhani hum hum phat🔽om ghinnapaya sminnapaya

original: sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hu~m hu~m phat/_om g+hin+na pa ya smin+na pa ya/_om a na ba ga ban ba
analyzed: sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hu~m hu~m phat/_om g+hin+na pa ya smin+na pa ya/_om a na ba ga ban ba
translated: om anabhagava nabha🔽vajra hum hum🔽In the center of the eight-petaled lotus of the heart, there is a hum.

original: badzra hum hum phat/_/_@#/_/snying kar pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi lte bar hum bo/_phyogs bzhir rtshogs lo kham hum tshhogs
analyzed: badzra hum hum phat/_/_@#/_/snying kar pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi lte bar hum bo/_phyogs bzhir rtshogs lo kham hum tshhogs
translated: In the four directions of the lotus, there is a hum.

original: khar kham khar /_spyi gtshug ke rtsha/_sna ba g.yas me sre _/_ltag par ba yam/_sna ba g.yon sum bi/_smin dbus snin kham/_mig gnyis lo/_phrag pa gnyis sam sa /_mchan khung gnyis sa sa/_nu ma gnyis memam/_sna rtshe rba
analyzed: khar kham khar /_spyi gtshug ke rtsha/_sna ba g.yas me sre _/_ltag par ba yam/_sna ba g.yon sum bi/_smin dbus snin kham/_mig gnyis lo/_phrag pa gnyis sam sa /_mchan khung gnyis sa sa/_nu ma gnyis memam/_sna rtshe rba
translated: in the two eyes, lo lo;🔽in the two shoulders, sam sa;🔽in the two armpits, sa sa;🔽in the two breasts, mem mem;🔽in the throat, su su;🔽in the mouth, nye bya;🔽in the movement, rgo su;🔽in the heart, me ham;

original: su/_kha la snye bye/_'gul par rgo_su/_snying kar me ham/_lgangs par me kham/_rtags la lo tsham/_bshang
analyzed: su/_kha la snye bye/_'gul par rgo_su/_snying kar me ham/_lgangs par me kham/_rtags la lo tsham/_bshang
translated: in the kidneys, me kham;🔽in the anus, lo tsha;🔽in the genitals, re kham;🔽in the thighs, hri sho;🔽in the calves, me rtsa;

original: bar re kham brla la hr-i sho byin pa la me rtsha/_sor mo la rgyu su/_bol la memam/_the bo la bi tshi/_pus mo la rba/
analyzed: bar re kham brla la hr-i sho byin pa la me rtsha/_sor mo la rgyu su/_bol la memam/_the bo la bi tshi/_pus mo la rba/
translated: in the fingers, rgyu su;🔽in the knees, mem mem;🔽in the ankles, bi tsi;🔽in the toes, rba rba;🔽in the mouth, rka rka;🔽in the nose, rku rku;🔽in the secret place, sum sum;

original: kha la rka_/_sna la rku/_gsang bar 7/_bshang bar sum/_mig gnyis la yang bzhi'o/_/rgyud nas sum cu
analyzed: kha la rka_/_sna la rku/_gsang bar 7/_bshang bar sum/_mig gnyis la yang bzhi'o/_/rgyud nas sum cu
translated: and in the two eyes, also sum sum.🔽The thirty-seven syllables are purified,🔽and the maṇḍala of syllables is arranged.🔽The hūṃ is in the heart,

original: rtsha bdun rnam dag pas/_/yi ge'i dkyil 'khor sgo par bya/_/ces pa/_snying kar hum dang bo/_phyogs bzhir
analyzed: rtsha bdun rnam dag pas/_/yi ge'i dkyil 'khor sgo par bya/_/ces pa/_snying kar hum dang bo/_phyogs bzhir
translated: and in the four directions,

original: /_lo kham rtu/_gnas nyer bzhir kham sre sogs/_mig sogs rang du rang zu sham su bzhir/_ye bzhi'o gtsho bo la mi
analyzed: /_lo kham rtu/_gnas nyer bzhir kham sre sogs/_mig sogs rang du rang zu sham su bzhir/_ye bzhi'o gtsho bo la mi
translated: In the twenty-four places, Khaṃ, Saṃ, and so on, in the eyes, and so on, in one’s own place, one’s own seed syllable, and in the four directions, the four seed syllables.🔽Akṣobhya, Cakrasaṃvara, Vairocana, Amoghasiddhi, Amitābha, and Ratnasambhava.🔽The color of the letter of the deity in one’s heart is like a garland of lamps.

original: skyod pa 'khor lo rnam snang don grub 'od dpag med rin 'byung /_rang snying chos kyi yi ge lha'i kha dog dang mthun pa mar me'i 'phreng ba bzhin bskor ba la dmigs la gsungs ste nges par bzhi bsdu ba snying ka'i 'od kyis gtsho bo dang🔽'khor dang bsrung 'khor dang bsrung 'khor la khyab rgya che bar byas/_'khor gtsho bo de las phyag gnyis pas bsngo ba
analyzed: skyod pa 'khor lo rnam snang don grub 'od dpag med rin 'byung /_rang snying chos kyi yi ge lha'i kha dog dang mthun pa mar me'i 'phreng ba bzhin bskor ba la dmigs la gsungs ste nges par bzhi bsdu ba snying ka'i 'od kyis gtsho bo dang 'khor dang bsrung 'khor dang bsrung 'khor la khyab rgya che bar byas/_'khor gtsho bo de las phyag gnyis pas bsngo ba
translated: The light from the heart pervades the entire retinue and the protection wheel.🔽The two-armed form emanates from the retinue and performs the dedication, and so on.

original: sogs bya thun gnyis sogs la phyag gnyis pa las spro ba sems can don byas dang tshhur bsdu ba la dmigs
analyzed: sogs bya thun gnyis sogs la phyag gnyis pa las spro ba sems can don byas dang tshhur bsdu ba la dmigs
translated: In the second session, and so on, the two-armed form emanates, performs the benefit of sentient beings, and dissolves into the seed syllable.

original: da la bsdu hum de las gtsho bo 'khor bzhi sgo sa la ye shes bzhug pa yan chad bya gsung te/_rtshe gcig sems
analyzed: da la bsdu hum de las gtsho bo 'khor bzhi sgo sa la ye shes bzhug pa yan chad bya gsung te/_rtshe gcig sems
translated: Now, gather the light into the hūṃ. From that, the four retinues and the four doors are the abode of the gnosis beings.🔽It is said to perform up to that.

original: kyis mngon bzlas na/_/las kun thogs pa med par 'grub/_/dpal ldan
analyzed: kyis mngon bzlas na/_/las kun thogs pa med par 'grub/_/dpal ldan
translated: If you recite this mantra with the addition of the name of the deity, you will accomplish all activities without hindrance.

original: mngon brjod bla ma las/_/gsungs pa'i bsgrub thabs rnams bkod pa'i/_/bsngo
analyzed: mngon brjod bla ma las/_/gsungs pa'i bsgrub thabs rnams bkod pa'i/_/bsngo
translated: I have set down the means of accomplishment taught in the glorious🔽Uttaratantra.

original: ba'i dngos po dge des 'gro rnams sdang ba las ched du bya ba bsngo ba gnas skabs dang mthar thug gnyis
analyzed: ba'i dngos po dge des 'gro rnams sdang ba las ched du bya ba bsngo ba gnas skabs dang mthar thug gnyis
translated: By the virtue of this, may all beings attain the two kinds of🔽mastery, temporary and ultimate.

original: gsung /_/rnam rgyal dngos grub mchog thob d+harma tshakra mchod rten gyi 'khor lta bu zlum po badzra rad na'i rad
analyzed: gsung /_/rnam rgyal dngos grub mchog thob d+harma tshakra mchod rten gyi 'khor lta bu zlum po badzra rad na'i rad
translated: The Dharmacakra stupa is like the wheel of the stupa of the same name.

original: na tsha gsum pa ste zur gsum gyi logs gsum la dmag gsum pa'o/_/shog_/bcom ldan 'das dpal
analyzed: na tsha gsum pa ste zur gsum gyi logs gsum la dmag gsum pa'o/_/shog_/bcom ldan 'das dpal
translated: The Vajra Reṇu stupa is triangular, with three sides and three corners.🔽The glorious Bhagavān Vajra is the vajra of destruction and indivisibility.

original: rdo rje rdo rje ni 'joms pa dang mi phyed pa ste/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /_rtag pa gnyis pa las/_mi shes pa'i ri bo chen
analyzed: rdo rje rdo rje ni 'joms pa dang mi phyed pa ste/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /_rtag pa gnyis pa las/_mi shes pa'i ri bo chen
translated: In the Vajradāka and the second part of the Nityātantra, it says:🔽Because it destroys the great mountain of ignorance, gnosis itself is the vajra.🔽And:

original: po 'joms pas na ye shes nyid rdo rje'o/_/ces pa dang /_rdo rje mi phyed zhes bya ste/_ces pa'o/_/gnod mdzes khro
analyzed: po 'joms pas na ye shes nyid rdo rje'o/_/ces pa dang /_rdo rje mi phyed zhes bya ste/_ces pa'o/_/gnod mdzes khro
translated: The vajra is called indivisible.🔽Sumbha is wrathful.

original: bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs slob
analyzed: bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs slob
translated: The means of accomplishment of the great king of the gods, the conqueror of all enemies🔽

original: dpon prad dz+nya rak+shir tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: dpon prad dz+nya rak+shir tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The means of accomplishment of the great king of the yakṣas, the great wrathful king Vajrabhairava, who conquers all enemies, composed by the master Prajñārakṣita, is complete.

original: kha che'i mkhan po b+ha tra bo d+hi dang /_a tshar+ya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug🔽gis bsgyur ba'o//_// phan gdags bya ba 'dogs byed bshad/_/'dogs tshhul ma tshhang kha skong dang /_/mi gsal gsal byed cha
analyzed: kha che'i mkhan po b+ha tra bo d+hi dang /_a tshar+ya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o//_// phan gdags bya ba 'dogs byed bshad/_/'dogs tshhul ma tshhang kha skong dang /_/mi gsal gsal byed cha
translated: Translated by the Kashmiri abbot Buddhaguhya and the great editor and translator of the Dharma, the monk Tsūnyi Nyingpo.

original: mthun la/_/nges pa bskyed pa gsum yin no/_/man tra mi 'grub pa'i rgyu bzhi lung ma thob pa/_yid ma ches pa/
analyzed: mthun la/_/nges pa bskyed pa gsum yin no/_/man tra mi 'grub pa'i rgyu bzhi lung ma thob pa/_yid ma ches pa/
translated: The four causes for not accomplishing mantra are: not receiving the transmission, not having confidence,🔽not abandoning the four faults of speech, and not having an uninterrupted repetition.

original: ngag gi nyes pa bzhi ma spangs pa/_bzlas pa bar ma chad pa'o/_/lung bla ma gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i lung yod
analyzed: ngag gi nyes pa bzhi ma spangs pa/_bzlas pa bar ma chad pa'o/_/lung bla ma gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i lung yod
translated: The transmission is the lineage of transmission from one guru to another.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gnod mdzes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad  rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gnod mdzes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sdang ba thams cad  rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/
translated: The means of accomplishment of the blessed one, the great wrathful king glorious Vajrabhairava, who conquers all enemies,

original: pa'am rten byin brlabs can las so/
analyzed: pa'am rten byin brlabs can las so/
translated: Or it is from a blessed support.
